page.title: 17Health Care in Gt. Horwood
page.content: There are now Health Service facilities in the village of Great Horwood anyone requiring medical attention needs to travel. There are two local doctor's surgeries provided at Health Centres in Winslow (2miles) and Buckingham (8 miles).District nurses based at these Health centres visit patients in the village. There are several hospitals in the area. The nearest being the small hospital at Buckingham. People requiring hospital treatment may go to either the Royal Bucks or Stoke Mandeville hospitals in Aylesbury,the Milton Keynes hospital or travel as far as the John Radcliffe hospital in Oxford. Dental services can be found in Winslow,Buckingham and Bletchley.
